page.title: 10CURDWORTH HEALTH & HOUSING
page.content: HEALTH; THERE ARE NO DOCTORS, DENTISTS OR CHEMIST, SO RESIDENTS TRAVEL OUT OF THE VILLAGE. A CHILDREN'S CLINIC IS HELD EACH MONTH IN THE VILLAGE HALL, WHERE A DOCTOR AND HEALTH VISITOR ARE PRESENT. THE NEAREST GENERAL HOSPITAL IS AT SUTTON COLDFIELD. EMERGENCY AMBULANCES COME FROM DORDON, WATER ORTON HAS A DOCTOR'S SURGERY, DENTIST AND CHEMIST. HOUSING; THE "OLD" CHARACTOR OF CURDWORTH HAS GONE AND NEW HOUSES OF VARIOUS STYLES BUILT. THE HOUSING IN CURDWORTH IS A GOOD MIX;OLD PEOPLE'S BUNGALOWS; LUXURY FOUR BED DETACHED; TENANTED COTTAGES; COUNCIL HOUSES; 3 BED SEMI'S AND DETACHED AND TOWN HOUSES. IN ALL ABOUT 410 PROPERTIES. WATER ORTON ALSO HAS A VARIETY OF HOUSES COTTAGES AND MAISONETTES MAKING ABOUT 200 HOMES IN THIS GRID. BOTH VILLAGES BEING NEAR TO BIRMINGHAM ARE POPULAR WITH COMMUTERS.
